caption: Amazing ownership and the food is incredible! Fresh and authentic.. definitely will be back on the regular.
Everything seems to be fine, but there are some staff that needs to observe but still good customer service!!
One of the best chicken sandwiches I've ever had. Delivery was super fast, fries even traveled well, which is rare. Chana masala is excellent, if you like spicy. Very highly recommend.

I highly recommend you guys to try “Chicken Wrap” of this restaurant!! Juicy chicken bbq with awesome sweet chilly sauce!! Overall food quality is good but Chicken Wrap is the best one. The owner is also super friendly and nice guy lol Let’s try it!

My friends and I ordered food last Friday and OMGGGG it was so amazing! I don't normally write reviews and these people didn't ask me to write one but I just felt that it deserves at least a review for their exemplary quality of food as well as the service! The Chicken Qorma was the best I've ever had from an outside place, it had a nice, homely taste. My friends were saying the same about the Biryani and Chicken Boti. The restaurant staff was the most friendly as well, looked like its a family-owned business. Oh yes, and they gave us an extra kheer with the order! Thanks for that! I look forward to ordering a lot more food from here and also dining in!
Best Indian/Pakistani food out of Devon! Would highly recommend. The owner and staff are extremely friendly and the biryani was a household favorite. We will definitely be back soon!
I had really good experience at aroma. I ordered seekh kababs, okra and rice pudding,  Everything was really delicious and up to our expectation. Thanks for opening a desi restaurant in west loop.

Tried the bihari kabob, seekh kabob and chicken tikka. Bihari kabob were excellent, enjoyed the grilled onions that it came with. Seekh kabob were super tender, melt in your mouth. chicken tikka was also good. An amazing meal for our ketogenic diet! cant wait to try again!

Food was perfectly cooked and was delicious, resturant was clean. The owner is very passionate about the quality of the food which was reflected in our order. Highly recommend naan and kabob. We will definitely be visiting again soon!
Amazing food! Extremely flavorful and mouthwatering. The kabab and wraps are a must try!

First time trying Pakistani & Indian foods, and it was completely amazing food out here in Aroma Desi Grill. Owner is super friendly as well as the cashier. Butter chicken is taste incredible, and chicken wrap was awesome! I can't wait to bring all my firends to try the new menu out here! Highly recommended!
